citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
During the routine inspection of June 04, 2024, the licensee did not have the environment enhancement plan for birds nor
the contingency plan available for review. Review of these programs allows APHIS officials to determine if the plans are
complete for all animals involved, thus ensuring that the birds in your care are are receiving appropriate psychological
care and you are prepared to safeguard your animals during emergencies or disasters. Each exhibitor shall, during
business hours, allow APHIS officials: to examine records required to be kept by the Act and the regulations and the
standards in this part.
To be corrected by June 18, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the curator.
Additional Inspectors:
KATHARINE FRANK, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
During the routine inspection of June 04, 2024, the licensee did not have the environment enhancement plan for birds nor 
the contingency plan available for review. Review of these programs allows APHIS officials to determine if the plans are 
complete for all animals involved, thus ensuring that the birds in your care are are receiving appropriate psychological 
care and you are prepared to safeguard your animals during emergencies or disasters. Each exhibitor shall, during 
business hours, allow APHIS officials: to examine records required to be kept by the Act and the regulations and the 
standards in this part. 
 
To be corrected by June 18, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the curator. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
KATHARINE FRANK, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
